name: owasp
description: Use when applying OWASP standards to identify and mitigate common security vulnerabilities. Covers OWASP Top 10 (2021), OWASP API Security Top 10 (2023), and CWE/SANS Top 25 with mitigation strategies for each category.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: CWE/SANS Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Weaknesses
